hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported that Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) forbade (the preparation of Nabidh) from grapes and dates, and unripe dates and dry dates (by mixing them together). He (the Prophet also) said:Prepare Nabidh from each one of them separately

chapter.ara-name: باب كَرَاهَةِ انْتِبَاذِ التَّمْرِ وَالزَّبِيبِ مَخْلُوطَيْنِ
chapter.eng-name: It is disliked to make Nabidh by mixing dried dates and raisins
